format: A tibble with 87 rows and 14 variables:

parameters.films: List of films the character appeared in
parameters.starships: List of starships the character has piloted
parameters.gender: The gender role or gender identity of the character as determined by their personality or the way they were programmed (as in the case for Droids).
parameters.vehicles: List of vehicles the character has piloted
parameters.birth_year: Year born (BBY = Before Battle of Yavin)
parameters.name: Name of the character
parameters.sex: The biological sex of the character, namely male, female, hermaphroditic, or none (as in the case for Droids).

title: Starwars characters
description:
Description
The original data, from SWAPI, the Star Wars API, https://swapi.py4e.com/, has been revised
to reflect additional research into gender and sex determinations of characters.
